CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1959, pg. A16 reads: "Married Last Saturday - Mr. and Mrs. James Andrews were married last Saturday by the Rev. William J. Harvey III at the home of the bride, who is the former Sonja Joannaha Wilson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel S. Wilson. Mrs. Emma Johnson, sister of the groom, was bridal attendant, and James Lowe, best man.  Ellis Wilson and Carl Cooper were ushers.  A reception followed the nuptials in Union Hall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five men, and five women, including Emma Johnson, second from left, groom James Andrews, center, and bride Sonja Joannaha Wilson Andrews, seated, gathered in interior with windows with sheer light colored curtains with ruffled edges, oriental rug, and piano
